name: Doors of Doom (mac)
description:
* If you are on windows, play meansquarederror.itch.io/doors-of-doom-windows instead *

In Mario Party 4, there is a game called Doors of Doom. In it, you choose either left or right. If Bowser is behind the door, you lose. If he is not, you proceed to the next room and do the same thing.

I have improved this idea by giving the player the chance to collect snowball projectiles to defeat bad guys, if your reflexes are good.

This game can be played entirely with a mouse, or entirely with the keyboard.
